Hello {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Practice_Name__c},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me to review your account and help you get started. I wanted to recap the highlights of our call and ensure you have all necessary information regarding the setup of your account.
Lighthouse 360 Portal & Messages
To log in to your portal just go to home.lh360.com. Your username is {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Portal_Username__c}. To recover your password click here. Be sure to bookmark this information for future reference.
As discussed, Maintenance Reminders and Recommended Services are able to be sent via postcard in addition to email. We have noted which postcards are currently active in your account. You can turn on the inactive features at any time, so feel free to reach out to us if you change your mind and we can easily get them set up for you. Prices referenced below may be subject to change upon advanced notice to you.
*Time-Based Maintenance Reminder Postcards ($1.00/postcard ) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Maintenance_Reminder_PC__c} Postcards that get mailed three and six months after the vehicle owner’s last visit notifying them that they are due for maintenance and to schedule an appointment.
*Mileage-Based Maintenance Reminder Postcards ($1.00/postcard ) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Maintenance_Reminder_PC_mileage__c} Postcards that get mailed a month after we see a vehicle is within 2,000 miles of 30,000/60,000/90,000 miles in your SMS notifying them that they are due for maintenance and to schedule an appointment.
*Recommended Services Postcards ($1.00/postcard) - {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Recommended_Services_PC__c} Postcards that get mailed one and two months after you have recommended a service asking them to schedule an appointment.
Website & Marketing Features
As part of your Lighthouse package, we have built an advertising website for your shop. This is a separate website that will be used to get your business found in more places across the web. To view your website, you can log in to your portal and click on the link that says “View Your Website” under the Web Presence tab.
Remember that we’ve also included a number of marketing features for you to take advantage of. We encourage you to log in and upload photos, monitor customer feedback, create offers, and manage your social presence.
Contacting Us
If at any point you have questions about your account, don't hesitate to give us a call at 855-855-8728. We have team members available to help assist you Monday - Friday from 9am to 7pm EST.
Thanks again for choosing Lighthouse. We look forward to working with you!
Lighthouse Support (855) 855-8728 autosupport@lighthousepmg.com
